alert.note: Alert for Indian River; St. Lucie (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 28 at 4:46PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected to continue. * WHERE...A portion of east central Florida, including the following counties, Indian River and St. Lucie. * WHEN...Until 545 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 442 PM EDT, The public reported heavy rain in the advisory area due to thunderstorms. Between 3 and 5.5 inches of rain has already fallen in the advisory area, and while rainfall has weakened, additional light rainfall may continue to cause some flooding issues on area roadways. - Additional rainfall amounts less than 1 inch are expected over the area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Fellsmere and Vero Lake Estates. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
